name: CelsiusMeter
description: CelsiusMeter is a simple web application that renders weather informations from an API and displays it on the screen. It was created using React and the axios to fetch the data from the API.

name: To Do list
description: To Do list is a simple one page web application created using React, a good example of using hooks, mainly the useState and useEffect hooks, you can add new tasks and delete them as well.
